titles: A poem on the coronation of James the II, King of Great-Britain, France and Ireland, &c., who was crowned at Westminster-Abey the 23th of April, 1685
author: Ker, Patrick, fl. 1691.
notes: Written by Patrick Ker. Cf. DNB.
